thread.section_title: Fine Rug Collection Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fine Rug Collection | finerugcollection.com
thread.title: Alice Ginsburg
thread.title_full: Fine Rug Collection reviewed by Alice Ginsburg

author: Alice Ginsburg
title: Alice Ginsburg
text:
The 2 rugs were, of course, beautiful but the remarkable part of my experience was the organized system for shipping and exchanges.
My original rug order was too large for the space (my measuring error) so I took advantage of the 90 day exchange/return policy. The original rug went back with free shipping and the correct size came back, also free shipping. Everything is programmed and if needed, a service person answers any questions within hours.
I did not shop locally first so I cannot compare their pricing but they do offer discounts and sale items.
